title: The Best of RISK! Inanity
description:
A collection of the best original songs, sound collages, and easter eggs ever featured on RISK!

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (David Buchs, Steven Bernstein, Soce, the Elemental Wizard, Roosevelt Dime, Andrew Burns, J. Walter Hawkes, Brian Babylon, Ts Madison, Ian Steffe, Charlie Brown, Tim Sutton, Detox, Alaska, Mrs. Slocombe, Nathan Phillips, Joe Schiappa, People Like Us, Morningbell, The Beatles, XTC, Scooby Doo, Clay Davis, Tom Brady, Ergo Phizmizz, Fujiya and Miyagi, Leibya Rogers, Lana Del Ray, David Crabb, Kevin Allison, Jordan Cooper, Alec Gross, Jeff Barr, Joseph Spence)
